name: spo-csom-properties
title: Query advanced CSOM properties with PnP PowerShell
shortDescription: This sample shows how to query CSOM properties with PnP PowerShell by writing C# code, importing it in PowerShell and sending a single Invoke-PnPQuery request

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Query advanced CSOM properties with PnP PowerShell

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
